properties.description:
Metadata-Driven Ingestion Framework 
Data Validation: RowCount
Connect to source and sink instances and count the rows from the file copied. Validate the result and send it to Azure Data Factory.

source:
**IMPORTANT**
Configuration for testing and debug
Change the value of "testing=False" for production environment.
Change the value of debug variables to see or hide prints with information

# Data for testing.
SinkGlobalParameters =  "{\"kv_scope_name\":\"ADLS_Spark\",\"kv_workspace_id\":\"MDIF-la-workspace-Id\",\"kv_workspace_pk\":\"MDIF-la-workspace-pk\",\"raw_storage_secret\":\"\",\"raw_storage_name\":\"\",\"sink_container_name\":\"synapsedata\",\"schema_container_name\":\"schemas\",\"output_container_name\":\"datatransformation\",\"adls_storage_name\":\"aicscpgdemo02\",\"adls_storage_secret_name\":\"MDIF-ADLSmetadatadriven2-AccountKey\",\"sink_type\":\"ADLS\"}"

DataValidationParameters = "{\"FwkLogId\":5,\"SrcObjectChild\":\"Product.csv\",\"DvMappingId\":11,\"SourcePath\":\"source/jsonfile/Product.json\",\"ConvertPath\":\"/Converted/ADLS/TripData/2022/01/25/16/\",\"SinkFolderPath\":\"Converted/ADLS/Files/Product/2022/01/07/15/DataValidation/\",\"FileName\":\"\",\"RowsRead\":null,\"RowsCopied\":null,\"SourceType\":\"parquet\",\"SchemaName\":\"Files\",\"SrcObject\":\"TripData_20130101.parquet\",\"InstanceURL\":\"https://adlsmetadatadriven.dfs.core.windows.net/\",\"Port\":null,\"UserName\":null,\"SecretName\":\"MDIF-ADLS-AccountKey\",\"SrcPath\":\"source/jsonfile\",\"IPAddress\":null,\"NotebookPath\":\"/Shared/Metadata Driven Ingestion Framework/Data Validation/NB_01_RowCount\",\"FileFormat\":\"parquet\",\"FunctionName\":\"RowCount\",\"DvMethod\":\"Databricks\",\"ConditionFlag\":1,\"EntRunId\":\"59f03a27-fa44-4c9b-92ec-598d4a808166\",\"InputParameter\": {\"Column Name\":\"DateId\"}}"
DataValidationParameters = "{\"FwkLogId\":5,\"SrcObjectChild\":\"Product.csv\",\"DvMappingId\":11,\"SourcePath\":\"source/jsonfile/Product.json\",\"ConvertPath\":\"/Converted/ADLS/TripData/2022/01/25/16/\",\"SinkFolderPath\":\"Converted/ADLS/Files/Product/2022/01/07/15/DataValidation/\",\"FileName\":\"\",\"RowsRead\":null,\"RowsCopied\":null,\"SourceType\":\"parquet\",\"SchemaName\":\"Files\",\"SrcObject\":\"TripData_20130101.parquet\",\"InstanceURL\":\"https://adlsmetadatadriven.dfs.core.windows.net/\",\"Port\":null,\"UserName\":null,\"SecretName\":\"MDIF-ADLS-AccountKey\",\"SrcPath\":\"source/jsonfile\",\"IPAddress\":null,\"NotebookPath\":\"/Shared/Metadata Driven Ingestion Framework/Data Validation/NB_01_RowCount\",\"FileFormat\":\"parquet\",\"FunctionName\":\"RowCount\",\"DvMethod\":\"Databricks\",\"ConditionFlag\":1,\"EntRunId\":\"59f03a27-fa44-4c9b-92ec-598d4a808166\",\"InputParameter\": {\"DateId\":[\"[0-9]{5}\"]}}"
DataValidationParameters = "{\"FwkLogId\":5,\"SrcObjectChild\":\"Product.csv\",\"DvMappingId\":11,\"SourcePath\":\"source/jsonfile/Product.json\",\"ConvertPath\":\"/Converted/ADLS/TripData/2022/01/25/16/\",\"SinkFolderPath\":\"Converted/ADLS/Files/Product/2022/01/07/15/DataValidation/\",\"FileName\":\"\",\"RowsRead\":null,\"RowsCopied\":null,\"SourceType\":\"parquet\",\"SchemaName\":\"Files\",\"SrcObject\":\"TripData_20130101.parquet\",\"InstanceURL\":\"https://adlsmetadatadriven.dfs.core.windows.net/\",\"Port\":null,\"UserName\":null,\"SecretName\":\"MDIF-ADLS-AccountKey\",\"SrcPath\":\"source/jsonfile\",\"IPAddress\":null,\"NotebookPath\":\"/Shared/Metadata Driven Ingestion Framework/Data Validation/NB_01_RowCount\",\"FileFormat\":\"parquet\",\"FunctionName\":\"RowCount\",\"DvMethod\":\"Databricks\",\"ConditionFlag\":1,\"EntRunId\":\"59f03a27-fa44-4c9b-92ec-598d4a808166\",\"InputParameter\": {\"Target Count\":\"24\"}}"
DataValidationParameters = "{\"FwkLogId\":5,\"SrcObjectChild\":\"Product.csv\",\"DvMappingId\":11,\"SourcePath\":\"source/jsonfile/Product.json\",\"ConvertPath\":\"/Converted/ADLS/TripData/2022/01/25/16/\",\"SinkFolderPath\":\"Converted/ADLS/Files/Product/2022/01/07/15/DataValidation/\",\"FileName\":\"\",\"RowsRead\":null,\"RowsCopied\":null,\"SourceType\":\"parquet\",\"SchemaName\":\"Files\",\"SrcObject\":\"TripData_20130101.parquet\",\"InstanceURL\":\"https://adlsmetadatadriven.dfs.core.windows.net/\",\"Port\":null,\"UserName\":null,\"SecretName\":\"MDIF-ADLS-AccountKey\",\"SrcPath\":\"source/jsonfile\",\"IPAddress\":null,\"NotebookPath\":\"/Shared/Metadata Driven Ingestion Framework/Data Validation/NB_01_RowCount\",\"FileFormat\":\"parquet\",\"FunctionName\":\"RowCount\",\"DvMethod\":\"Databricks\",\"ConditionFlag\":1,\"EntRunId\":\"59f03a27-fa44-4c9b-92ec-598d4a808166\",\"InputParameter\": {\"Min Value\":\"0\" , \"Max Value\":\"1000\"}}"

import json

dv_params_dict = json.loads(DataValidationParameters)

sink_params_dict = json.loads(SinkGlobalParameters)

# Declare input parameter variable
column_names = (dv_params_dict['InputParameter']['Column Name']).split(',')
#column_names = [columns.lower() for columns in column_names]
column_names
